author: fwyzard
body:
Add an external and a tool file for  [Niels Lohmann's JSON for Modern C++](https://github.com/nlohmann/json) header-only library, from https://github.com/nlohmann/json .

Can be used in CMSSW by adding to a BuildFile.xml:
```xml
<use name="json"/>
```

and to a source or header file:
```c++
#include <nlohmann/json.hpp>
using json = nlohmann::json;
```

or, to include only the forward-declation:
```c++
#include <nlohmann/json_fwd.hpp>
using json = nlohmann::json;
```

See https://github.com/nlohmann/json/blob/develop/README.md for some documentation.
title: Add Niels Lohmann's JSON for Modern C++ header-only library
